text: mo Gershom mo Eliezer, nia dama daane dogolua a Zipporah. (Moses gu helekai, “Au nogo hai tangada henua gee i hongo tenua digau tuadimee”, gei mee ga hagaingoo dana dama daane e dahi bolo Gershom.18.3 Gershom: Di lee o di ingoo deenei i nnelekai Hebrew le e hai gadoo be di bida helekai “tangada mai i daha”.18.3 Nnegau 7.29
